org.grobid.core.utilities

Class XMLFilterFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FileInputStream
        • org.grobid.core.utilities.XMLFilterFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class XMLFilterFileInputStream
extends FileInputStream
    Custom FileInputStream skipping invalid xml version 1.0 characters. The list of invalid xml characters rely on Xerces implementation.
